treatment.strain: HO1-1T = IAM 14250T, JCM 8857T, DSM 7519T and ATCC 51241T
treatment.reference: Reclassification of Sulfolobus hakonensis Takayanagi et al. 1996 as Metallosphaera hakonensis comb. nov. based on phylogenetic evidence and DNA G+C content IJESM 53:1607-1608
treatment.description: The description is the same as that given for Sulfolobus hakonensis except for the DNA G+C content of the type strain, which is 46.2 mol%. The type strain, HO1-1T, is deposited in several culture collections as IAM 14250T, JCM 8857T, DSM 7519T and ATCC 51241T.
